captions.text: - I can't believe I'm unwrapping an Oreo.
- Wait, it doesn't look like an Oreo.

- This is not a
conventionally-shaped Oreo.
- Do ya think this is less calories?
- The cream is too chalky to be cream.
- This texture would go great with

- It tastes like if Oreo
made a children's medicine.

Oreos are not soft.
- Soft cookies?

- There's a surprise waiting
in the middle for us.
- So it's soft but what is that?
- I feel like I bit into a jelly bean.

- This is like a diet cookie
with all the calories.

- I feel like this is
such a gentle dessert.

- This is sadder than
when, like, the hard Oreos
- Oh my God, I like it.
It kinda tastes like coffee Oreos.

- I feel like I'm eating
an artisanal Oreo.

- I will say that the
more I eat it the more

I'm like, "Yeah, I
could eat this forever."

- What is milk--
- Milk white chocolate?
It looks like a little tent.

- Do people in Japan
just like tiny things?
I like the soft cookies better.

- If this were a lotion,
I'd rub it on my body.
- I'm gonna eat all of this.

- Still don't know how
you dunk any of this.
- Okay, here's the thing is that they're
not a bad cookie, they're just not Oreos.

- My overall thought is that
I'm happy to be an American.
- Certainly not either of those things.

This is like just the
right amount of sweetness.
- I would rather eat the normal "American"
You're beautiful just the way you are.

- I'm using chopsticks
in honor of Japanese--
- Yeah, I brought them from my desk.

comments.text:
Usually the comments are awesome on Buzzfeed food related video's. But here 
everyone is talking shit about one another. .-. Like: "American's like big 
stuff. American's are so close minded." Mostly bashing on American's. I'm 
not butthurt or anything, but c'mon, it's not like your country and such is 
perfect either. Also, I could've sworn I saw a comment that American's are 
all fat. Well, every country has some amount of obese people. It doesn't 
help that there's a McDonald's around EVERY corner. But even then, it's 
genetics, diet, etc. Have a nice day. ^^﻿
